name: Simple Static Websites
description: This is a collection of static websites created using basic web technologies. These websites do not require a database or server-side processing. They are fully responsive, ensuring they look good on all devices. These websites are ideal for showcasing content without the need for complex functionality.

name: Personal Portfolio
description: A simple portfolio website that highlights skills, experience, and projects. Designed to be clean, easy to navigate, and visually appealing..
